Yggdrasil: This is pretty bad... They didn't write over the basic 
program but instead carefully removed everything... except for some 
passive program. It seems tricky though; it's pred after all. The 
most I can do for now is to check the program's nature. This way, it 
won't cause any damage... yet...

He runs a more detailed scan of the unknown program.
